wiki.summary: "King of My Heart" is an uplifting anthem about the joy and power of finding true love. It speaks of recognizing a special person with whom you truly connect and admire. Through this connection, the couple finds a safe haven from the world, where they can find both independence and togetherness. They build a kingdom in their own room, free from the expectations and comparisons of outside influences, and the song celebrates the joy and freedom that comes from finding a partner that accepts and loves you for who you are. Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: "King of My Heart" is an uplifting anthem about the joy and power of finding true love. It speaks of recognizing a special person with whom you truly connect and admire. Through this connection, the couple finds a safe haven from the world, where they can find both independence and togetherness. They build a kingdom in their own room, free from the expectations and comparisons of outside influences, and the song celebrates the joy and freedom that comes from finding a partner that accepts and loves you for who you are. Ultimately, this song offers hope and security, acknowledging that true and lasting love is something worth waiting for, and that when such love is found it is more beautiful and special than anything you can imagine. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
